title: Energy Saver
summary_short: Focuses on renewable energy and clean power grids.
intro_short: This project introduces solar-based grid technology.
impact: Reduces fossil fuel dependency and carbon emissions.

title: Eco Transport
summary_short: Improves urban mobility through electric transit.
intro_short: A large-scale initiative for electric buses.
impact: Reduces urban noise and air pollution.

title: Green Farming
summary_short: Promotes sustainable agriculture and soil health.
